about_the_game:
This is a third-person horror game set in a residential area in 2000s Japan.
It's the complete version of the free horror game GOHOME, which was released in 2019 and caused a boom.
The map has been doubled, and six more ghosts, including hidden characters, have been added to the game.
There's no grotesque , so even kids can enjoy it.

You've been separated from your parents and you're going home alone.
It's the usual way home, but something's wrong.
You're being chased by someone so you run away and go home.
It's a sad, scary and mysterious game, but I hope it will be a lovely memory for you.

The soundtrack is now being streamed at amazon music, applemusic and other places!
↓You can buy high-resolution music at this site.
https://1ma2szk.booth.pm/

Basic operation
moving: WSAD
jumping: space
crouch: Ctrl
running: Shift

Third person viewpoint
Auto save
detailed_description:
Update Notes

In 2020, on December 25, GOHOME received a major update. Update contents ・Fixed a bug that caused the language to be initialized on every launch. ・Fixed physics bug in the last stage. ・New maps and characters added (after clearing the night town stage) ・The background and some of the effects have been changed. ・Add mini games The mini-games have nothing to do with the story, they are just an added bonus. If the game doesn't start after the update, please uninstall and reinstall it.


About the Game

The map has been doubled, and six more ghosts, including hidden characters, have been added to the game. There's no grotesque , so even kids can enjoy it. You've been separated from your parents and you're going home alone. It's the usual way home, but something's wrong. You're being chased by someone so you run away and go home. It's a sad, scary and mysterious game, but I hope it will be a lovely memory for you. pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: windows10 64bit
  • Processor: intel Core i5
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX950
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: windows10 64bit
  • Processor: intel Core i7-3770
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX950
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

The map has been doubled, and six more ghosts, including hidden characters, have been added to the game.
supported_languages:
